posts.title: Clemson going downhill
posts.message: Man, Clemson played horribly during the game against Notre Dame! They are so stupid! I could play better and give better calls with my mouth ducktapped and my hands tied behind my back!

posts.title: Names given at birth
posts.message: I don't understand the name i was given at birth

posts.title: Coca-Cola
posts.message: I can't believe this stupid company is still running! Like, the drink sucks what are those fools thinking putting the drink on the market

posts.title: Air-Fryers are AMAZING
posts.message: Air-fryers are the best thing since sliced bread. I use it for almost anything from reheating leftovers to cooking a meal for the family. I always hear people complaining about how hard they are to clean but if you just do it right after use it is relatively easy.

posts.title: Dogs are interesting
posts.message: My dog does so many weird things that I always end up in a better move after watching him for a while. Though I do wonder if he thinks the same when watches me around the house.

posts.title: Gas Prices
posts.message: I don't know about yall but the price on gas is getting out of hand. Like seriously, who is able to pay $80 a week on gas!

posts.title: Clothing Prices
posts.message: Ok, to start I understand that some pieces of clothes are just worth the price, but come on, who can spend $20 on every piece of clothing for kids that are 3,4, even 5 years old.
